long_description: The prAna Horton shorts offer leisurely style and stretchy comfort. These everyday shorts are made from a woven polyester/rayon/spandex fabric that breathes well and moves with you. Zip fly with button closure; hand and back welt pockets. prAna Horton shorts have a standard fit. Closeout.
